newsitem.title: USA: IMM currency futures end mostly weaker,pound skids.
newsitem.headline: IMM currency futures end mostly weaker,pound skids.

text.p: Jan 2 - IMM currency futures ended mostly weaker. Sterling skidded to sharp losses that erased Tuesday's big gains. Afternoon activity slowed, although a fund sold 1,000 March Canadian dollars from $0.7312 - $0.7297. A fund also sold 1,000 March sterling, brokers said. Some still see pound upside. Big losses in US bonds, stocks helped most currencies cut losses.
